description:
This retro CGI is a relaxing pixel art of Dolphins jumping and swimming in a see of black and white. Clicking the mouse will switch colors. Moving the mouse over the waters will cause waves. 
If you don't want clicking the screen switch between black/white then check out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2076082177]Blanc Noir II[/url] You can also change the colors of water and Sky using Wallpaper Engine controls in the new version.
Enjoy!
title: Blanc Noir
